DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Immunosuppressive Therapy Combined With Cord Blood Transfusion Treatment Severe Aplastic Anemia
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible patient 60 year old confirm SAA , without HLA match sibling previous ATG treatment history . Patients exclude present fatal disease , include respiratory failure , heart failure , liver kidney function failure et al severely allergic biologic product . To evaluate additional cord blood transfusion could accelerate hematopoietic reconstitution severe aplastic anemia ( SAA ) patient receive IST therapy , 120 eligible patient randomize two group , IST group cord blood transfusion group . Patients IST group receive standard IST include ATG ( Thymoglobuline® , Genzyme ) 3.5mg/kg/d×5d plus oral cyclosporine A（CSA ) start 5mg/kg/d adjust maintain trough serum concentration 200-300ng/ml . While patient cord blood transfusion group receive dose course ATG CSA control group one unit cord blood 2 HLA-A , B DRB1 mismatch transfuse 24h last dose ATG administration . The neutrophil recovery day define first day 3 consecutive day absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) > 0.5×109/L , without G-CSF adminstration . Platelet recovery day deﬁned occur ﬁrst 7 consecutive day blood platelet count ( BPC ) > 20×109/L , without transfusion support . Response ( CR , PR NR ) evaluate 3 , 4 , 6,9 , 12 , 18 24months treatment . The primary end point neutrophil recovery day second end point response rate ( CR+PR ) , treatment related mortality , disease free survival overall survival .
